description:
A stiff carbon shaft and dihedral blades deliver a soft catch that lets you keep up a steady, efficient pace. The longer your trip or heavier your boat, the more you’ll appreciate its easy, powerful stroke.

  • Shaft is 70% carbon, 30% fibreglass and features a smooth finish
  • Select paddles use injection-moulded construction that offers stiffness, lightness and a low swing weight at a reasonable price
  • Nylon dihedral blade delivers smooth, efficient strokes
  • Low angle blade has an asymmetrical shape to fit a wide range of paddling activities
  • Kingpin system adjusts in 15° increments for precise feathering or unfeathering. It requires only 1/8in. of separation for adjustment and locks play-free to perform like a 1-piece paddle
name: Accent Lanai Select Paddle
